column4: GIn> I can open all of the under Feisty, but with all players (totem, vlc..), videos are "diluted", and it's not like a simple gamma problem
And other thing, does anyone knows how to change the password of keyring-manager ? Thanks !
I think you'll find this usefull also: http://ubuntu-tutorials.com/2007/07/12/automatically-unlocking-the-default-gnome-keyring-pam-keyring/
